rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(35, 162, 217), rgb(29, 138, 185)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(14, 125, 173), rgb(69, 164, 206));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 85px; margin-left: 359px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #ffffff;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#ffffff, #121212); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
